section_history.title:
A Story that
Shapes Experience
section_history.text:
Our storage silo manufacturing company was founded in 1952 by Mr. Marcel Godin.

Initially specialized in grain storage, GODIN designs, manufactures, and installs storage silos of all capacities and for all types of powders.
